author: nordbjerg
content: Can someone clarify exactly what is in for EIP-7742 in devnet 5? Do we still do gas normalization? I think we talked about not merging some of these changes, but which? https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9047/files

author: ralexstokes
content: im working on a summary from yesterday's call w/ decisions made

author: ralexstokes
content: you can ignore #9047

author: ralexstokes
content: working on getting the rest of the "base" 7742 PRs merged ASAP

author: ralexstokes
content:
these are the relevant items for 7742:
- https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3800
- https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7742
- https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/574

author: ralexstokes
content: we also have (separate to 7742) this: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7691 and this https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9060

author: nordbjerg
content: what do we do for calc excess blob gas? just replace the constants with CL provided values?

author: ralexstokes
content: `calc_excess_blob_gas` is left alone

author: ralexstokes
content: we will change the update fraction following EIPs#9060

author: nordbjerg
content: it would work off of 3/6 then no?

author: ralexstokes
content: which part?

author: nordbjerg
content: Ah nvm

author: nordbjerg
content: you're correct

author: nordbjerg
content: ty for clarifying <@539495253418180618>

author: nordbjerg
content: Actually <@539495253418180618> we do `- TARGET_DATA_GAS_PER_BLOCK` here: https://github.com/alloy-rs/alloy/blob/20d13faff78325dda42de8952e0addad31d11db7/crates/eips/src/eip4844/mod.rs#L126-L129

author: nordbjerg
content: this is 3 * 0x20000, so assumes min of 3

author: ralexstokes
content: that constant would now be dynamic and coming from the CL

author: nordbjerg
content: gotcha

author: ralexstokes
content: and then the only other thing to note is that we agreed the pareto-optimal change at the moment to account for the fee market in a regime of different target would be addressed by the changes in #9060 linked above

author: ralexstokes
content:
so looks like this line would change: https://github.com/alloy-rs/alloy/blob/20d13faff78325dda42de8952e0addad31d11db7/crates/eips/src/eip4844/mod.rs#L140

(although still can be a hard-coded constant)

author: nordbjerg
content: yep

author: nordbjerg
content: ok ty

author: barnabasbusa
content: I have prepared this, hopefully it is correct, and can help you understand which PRs made it to devnet 5, and which are cancelled. https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-5
